snippet: A man who fled his trial a day before being convicted and sentenced in the repeated group sexual assault of an 11-year-old girl was found in an apartment in northeast Houston.
abstract: Eric McGowen, who fled his trial a day before being convicted and sentenced in the repeated group sexual assault of an 11-year-old Texas girl, is captured in Houston after nearly two weeks as a fugitive.
lead_paragraph: A man who fled his trial a day before being convicted and sentenced in the repeated group sexual assault of an 11-year-old girl was found in an apartment in northeast Houston.

headline.seo: Texas: Man Who Escaped Gang Rape Trial Is Captured
headline.main: Texas: Man Who Escaped Gang Rape Trial Is Captured After Nearly 2 Weeks
headline.print_headline: Texas: Man Who Escaped Rape Trial Is Captured After Nearly Two Weeks
